column4: hi. i need some help with grub in centos. i just did a gui netinstall of ubuntu. all went well until i came to the grub bit. some error occured and i didnt install it at all. LILO also wouldn't install properly. i am sharing the primary partition to mount /boot for both centos and ubuntu. in the lvm i have a shared swap and seperate volumes for both distros. grub is installed in centos' partition and boots fine. can i get ubuntu t
fine ok, this question then: how do i repair ubuntu's grub to load?
